#summary JIT implementation details

= General setup on ia32 =

== Registers ==

  * ESI contains global page address - used to reach kernel code, etc
  * EBX is data pointer of this
  * EAX + EDX usually contain current data/iface ptr or used in computations
  * ECX is scratch
